00018 NameGroupBox::NameGroupBox(QWidget* parent,
00019                                                    const QString& title): 
00020 QGroupBox(title, parent), 
00021 nameEdit_(0),
00022 displayNameEdit_(0), 
00023 descriptionEdit_(0) {
00024 
00025         // set the size policy for the widget
00026         setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Preferred, QSizePolicy::Maximum);
00027 
00028         // set the maximum height for the widget
00029         setMaximumHeight(150);
00030 
00031         // the layout manager for this widget
00032         QGridLayout* layout = new QGridLayout(this);
00033 
00034         QLabel* nameLabel = new QLabel(tr("Name:"), this);
00035         layout->addWidget(nameLabel, 0, 0, 1, 1);
00036 
00037         nameEdit_ = new QLineEdit(this);
00038         nameEdit_->setToolTip(tr("Set the name for the element"));
00039         nameEdit_->setProperty("mandatoryField", true);
00040 
00041         NameValidator* validator = new NameValidator(nameEdit_);
00042         nameEdit_->setValidator(validator);
00043         layout->addWidget(nameEdit_, 0, 1, 1, 1);
00044 
00045         QLabel* displayLabel = new QLabel(tr("Display Name:"), this);
00046         layout->addWidget(displayLabel, 1, 0, 1, 1);
00047 
00048         displayNameEdit_ = new QLineEdit(this);
00049         displayNameEdit_->setToolTip(tr("Set the display name for the element"));
00050         layout->addWidget(displayNameEdit_, 1, 1, 1, 1);
00051 
00052         QLabel* descriptionLabel = new QLabel(tr("Description:"), this);
00053         layout->addWidget(descriptionLabel, 2, 0, 1, 1);
00054 
00055         descriptionEdit_ = new QPlainTextEdit(this);
00056         descriptionEdit_->setToolTip(tr("Set the description for the element"));
00057         layout->addWidget(descriptionEdit_, 3, 0, 1, 2);
00058 
00059         // connect the signals that inform of changes made to items
00060         connect(nameEdit_, SIGNAL(textEdited(const QString&)),
00061                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00062         connect(nameEdit_, SIGNAL(textEdited(const QString&)),
00063                 this, SIGNAL(nameChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00064         connect(displayNameEdit_, SIGNAL(textEdited(const QString&)),
00065                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00066         connect(displayNameEdit_, SIGNAL(textEdited(const QString&)),
00067                 this, SIGNAL(displayNameChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00068         connect(descriptionEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged()),
00069                 this, SLOT(onDescriptionChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00070 }

00072 NameGroupBox::~NameGroupBox() {
00073 }
00074 
00075 QString NameGroupBox::getName() const {
00076         return nameEdit_->text();
00077 }
00078 
00079 QString NameGroupBox::getDisplayName() const {
00080         return displayNameEdit_->text();
00081 }
00082 
00083 QString NameGroupBox::getDescription() const {
00084         return descriptionEdit_->toPlainText();
00085 }
00086 
00087 bool NameGroupBox::isValid() const {
00088         return !nameEdit_->text().isEmpty();
00089 }
00090 
00091 void NameGroupBox::setName( const QString& name ) {
00092         nameEdit_->setText(name);
00093 }
00094 
00095 void NameGroupBox::setDisplayName( const QString& displayName ) {
00096         displayNameEdit_->setText(displayName);
00097 }
00098 
00099 void NameGroupBox::setDescription( const QString& description ) {
00100         // disconnect the signals 
00101         disconnect(descriptionEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged()),
00102                 this, SLOT(onDescriptionChanged()));
00103         descriptionEdit_->setPlainText(description);
00104         connect(descriptionEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged()),
00105                 this, SLOT(onDescriptionChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00106 }
00107 
00108 void NameGroupBox::onDescriptionChanged() {
00109         emit contentChanged();
00110         emit descriptionChanged(descriptionEdit_->toPlainText());
00111 }
00112 
00113 void NameGroupBox::setNameValidator( QValidator* validator ) {
00114         validator->setParent(nameEdit_);
00115         nameEdit_->setValidator(validator);
00116 }
